content.detailedDescription: On july 4th between 7 and 8 o'clock my wife, son and myself went out on the back porch to watch fire works in the neighborhood. after about 2 mind i noticed 3 glowing orbs to the north just sitting still in the sky. as i fixated on them they started to drop slowly , or even at a time then they went back up and stayed still again. they were pulsating as well .After about 10 mi s or so they faded out completely.
content.summary: Three glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: Not sure if i'm doing this correctly however it's a follow up of case 45708. it's been 2 months shy of being 2 years since the event and there are a couple weird things that have occurred at the area where the "thing" was on the ground, since the event, crops do not grow in that spot very well at all, just looking at them there is a big difference in size, like they are not getting light or food, also, exactly where it happened, 3 months after the incident, i noticed the gentleman who leases our land had a bulldozer, and other equipment digging up something, i asked him about what was going on, and found out that a electrical system which some sort of power supply underground had burned up when they first tried to power it up for the coming spring, it could be a coincidence, but exactly right there???  the event originally took place 2 days before xmas in 2012 so there was no crop growing at that time. the researcher who came out to talk about the case had my email address, however i for some reason can't access that email account, so it's been changed, if he could contact me again i sure would appreciate that.
content.summary: Group of 7 lights rose up about 1/2 mile away, began approach house at about 30mph, 100 ft altitude above field

content.detailedDescription: Looking to the s.W., with binoculars, about 9 in the eve. i observed several small lights, moving in a counter clock wise direction around a larger round, white object.  they appeared to enter this central object, and then spin outwards from it.  it appeared to be very far away, and not easily seen without the use of the binoculars. it remained stationary, and i watched it for about 15 min.  it was not there when i went out later that night.
content.summary: Small objects, spinning around and into a larger orb.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened back in 92 and i decided to post it because someone else may have encountered it and my story may help. i was not able to get a photo.
my girlfriend and i were on our way to california. we were driving on highway 50 headed west some miles after we drove through eureka. it was around midnight or 1 am. my girlfriend was asleep in the front seat. as you drive on highway 50 through the desert in nevada you go through valleys from one set of hills to the next and on average the valleys are around 15 to 25 miles across. i looked in the rear view mirror and saw a bright ball of light coming fast and steady straight up the highway behind us. it passed over our car headed west lighting up the highway as it went. as bright as it seemed it only lit up the highway about as wide as the highway was. it glowed pure white and had no streak or meteorite like tail. i could only see light and no structure other than it was a perfect sphere about 30 to 50 feet in diameter. there was no sound and no air disturbance. (it didn't stir up any dust or debris as it went) i estimate as it passed over head and down the highway in front of us that it was little more than 100 ft. off the ground. it disappeared silently over the next set of hills in a matter of seconds. if i had to estimate a speed i would guess in excess of between 800 or 900 mph. maybe more. i was in the navy and regularly observed fighters during war games making passes at speeds of 500 to 600 mph and they seem slow compared to the way this object moved. the whole event lasted around 30 to 45 seconds.
content.summary: A bright pure white ball of light roughly 30 to 50 ft. across

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at a park in gilbert, az. near cooper and warner street. my dog stopped to rest and i looked at an airliner in the western sky with a vapor trail headed east bound when i noticed these two bright star like lights at about the same height the plane was at traveling wnw without any vapor trail. i noticed that the lights were one in front of the other separated by about 1/2 inch and a little less than that from the plane. the two lights would be bright and then disappear then be bright again as they passed the plane headed west. the two lights appear and disappear at different times, not synced at all. the event lasted only about 10 min. or less before it was all over. when it was over a neighbor came to me and asked if i saw the lights in the sky and he saw the same thing as me.
content.summary: Observed airliner east bound with vapor trail. observed two star like objects west bound no vapor trails at about same altitude.

content.detailedDescription: I was having another round of insomnia so i was already awake at about 3am when i first heard it, i thought it was a helicopter at first so i got off my bed to close the window but i didn't see any light's like a normal chopper, which i thought was odd but didn't think much of. i laid back on my bed but the sound got stronger and louder, i still didn't see any lights or anything else for that matter, but the very loud sound was still there, i actually expected to also hear sirens but nothing like that at all. it was as though it was just hovered on top of my house, lasted about 2 hours, and not my husband nor my kids heard it, so weird because the sound was amazingly loud. i asked my in laws if they heard it since they live in the front house and she said no but my brother in law did, he said he also looked outside but saw nothing, only darkness and the loud sound. i have never heard anything like it in my life.
content.summary: Over my house

content.detailedDescription: Returning from store noticed what appeared to be offset christmas tree in the sky huge bright red yellow orange balls absorbed into each other and i have pictures at least three other  witnesses that i saw
content.summary: Six or more large bright red balls absorbed into each other. have pictures

content.detailedDescription:
Oklahoma city sighting - object seemed like an empty gallon of milk (general appearance but not in shape), with pipe structures visible when it was on top of 2 witnesses.  picture taken when object was from far away; unfortunately, no memory on cell phone was available to take pictures when the object was closer.  had to delete personal pictures to take the attached photo.  when object was far away, and before disappearing behind trees in the horizon, it looked like a saucer (disk).  

my fianc√© spotted the object first.  duration of sighting was about 5 minutes.

please examine picture and enhance digitally to figure out what the object was.
content.summary: Object seemed like an empty gallon of milk

content.detailedDescription: Around 12/2012 i witnessed an oval almost fireball appearing inbetween the two left stars in orion's belt.  the ball first appeared as a snap shot but remained as a dot then it began to expand slowly.  it almost covered the entire space inbetween the two left starts in orions's belt.  why was this not reported?  it is said intelligent life has and are visiting us now from a planet in that area.  it is possible they known this would happen, found our planet and are now here.  around 3am weds morning after the super bowl, i went to my back yard and sat on a comfortable chair.  i looked up at the stars (looking north east approx) and a star slightly off to my right but within my sight.  i just moved my head slightly to the right and i saw what happened.  a star that i was looking at suddenly got really bright.  i mean florescent pure white.  it then went to the right, making an extremely white line.  the white light then shot up making a square of incredibly white pure light.  i never took my eyes off.  there was a ship inside.  i just saw the first two front parts of the ship.  it was triangle, then another triangle after it but sectioned.  i noticed it was inside another cacoon type of ship.  the exterior of the cacoon ship mimiks the stars.  it was as if i was in the starship enterprise and witnessed being inside the holodeck.  the square shape the ship inside vanished suddenly.  it lasted about 5 seconds, but it was my luck that i was staring directly at that spot when it happened.  about two weeks later sitting in the same chair, i saw at around 7:30pm, to my amazement an object off to my right, or to my south west, going in circles about one quarter of an inch around, from my perspective.  it went round and round furiously, suddenly that same bright light appeared and something like a flea flew out.  the light suddenly disappeared but the object remained and it was going in circles the opposite way but it was slowing down.  finally, about two weeks ago standing infront of my pool, i just looked up and saw a light the size of a bright star flying from south to north and when it went over my head it left our atmosphere and curved to the right igniting is back engine as the sun the showed it's triangle shape and afterburners.  amazing.  all i described should be drawn by your people for humanitys record.  we are not alone.  who are they?  what do they want?  i know they are hear.
content.summary: 4 events. super nova, bright white light with ship inside, triangle ship ascending, circular fireball let ufo out bright light.

content.detailedDescription: My wife son, step son and i were sitting on our porch at the camelot hotel sometime around 10 oclock. im from pennsylvania soi never new myrtle was a hot box for these sightings.. the date was june 23rd. we saw these orbs appear one at a time btil there were 3 in a row. it was pretty amazing i tried to take video but i couldnt get anything.. i accidentaly got audio of our rection which is very entertaing. til this dayy we cant talk about it in front of my 12 year old stepson. if youwould want he audio i can probably email it or send it by phone.
content.summary: On vacation family sitting on hotel porch saw bright red orageish orbs hovering in and out for about 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
one object with halogen bright red, green and white
lights hovered n, ne over lake huron approx.45 degrees, another was spotted at approx. 90 degrees same description moving back and forth in the sky.Both objects were spotted at the same time. have seen this
object in the sky on occasion since june. at times the sighting will
last from 2-3 hours. noticed it tonight at 9:10 and it was gone by
10:00.
content.summary: Object with halogen bright red, green and white light hovered n, ne over lake huron, as well as one spotted 90 degrees north moving back and forth in sky

content.detailedDescription: Around 10 pm on saturday september 27th, me and three other friends were in the parking lot outside of the ridgemark golf course when i first noticed one singular red light. i told my friends that it looked weird since there were no blue lights or any other indicators of it being an aircraft. no more than five minutes later i notice that the lone red light had now multiplied into three lights. i immediately tell my friends to look at what i'm seeing. i was able to catch a 30 second video of the red lights orbiting around each other changing shape from a triangle to a straight line, then, finally, dissappearing. the whole scene lasted about two minutes.
content.summary: Three three red pulsating lights were observed orbiting around each other then forming into one light then dissapearing

content.detailedDescription: I got amazing footage from history channel of a real ufo, this show was not related to any type of ufo programe....Thats a fact....Wow...
content.summary: Saw it on tv caught it out of the blue i have dvr

content.detailedDescription: I first saw this one evening, around 11:30 pm, about a month ago, a "star" that was blinking and pulsating, rather than twinkling. totally stationary. i live near highland park, and have seen this object as i was looking ne, which puts it somewhere in the mt. wilson/ big bear area. i went home and got binoculars, which gave me a better view. again, blinking and pulsating, not star twinkles, and a fairly wide spectrum of colors. i went to bed thinking that it was very most likely not a star, and beyond that, who knows. two nights ago, monday the 29th, again around 11:30 pm, i saw it again, in almost the exact same spot in the sky, but a little closer this time, as the blinking and pulsating were more pronounced, and this time i could see some of the colors without binoculars. i went to bed that night thinking 95% that this object is not a star. last night, again around 11:30 pm ,i went to the exact same vantage point as the other two times and it was not there; a big blank dark patch of sky with no object. the other two times i had seen it there was nothing else in the sky near it (stars etc..), from this particular vantage point. more than anything, i would love to know if anyone else has noticed this. at a glance it would look like a star. after last night, and it not being there, i feel fairly certain it was a ufo, as it would have been too high in the sky i think for a helicopter, and sort of "parked" over something in the mountains or desert ne of la. i will keep looking, same time and place. and again, would really love to know if others have seen this.
content.summary: Too many twinkles and colors to be a star

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my car from the airport and just happened to look at the mountain range and saw the object. it was strange. i didn't know quite what to think of it other than it was a ufo. there was a large amount of cloud cover but the object stood out clearly as you can see in the picture.
content.summary: Like something out of independence day

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room when i heard a loud helicopter coming towards my house. it sounded different,  like it was going all-out. so i ran outside to my back patio.  when i got outside, coming from the north the was a red-orange orb being chased by a blackhawk helicopter, i thought that what i was seeing was in fact an orb being chased, and was not happy about it. the helicopter sounded like it was straining to keep up. the orb and the helicopter were about 500-1000 feet from the ground, and the orb was about 15-20 to the front and the right of and below the helicopter. this was not their radar post that leads out from the front of most blackhawks. the helicopter and the orb passed overhead with in about 15-20 seconds they were out of my view, and past the tree line.  i ran to the front of my house, to see if it was coming back or if i could get a far off glimpse, when i heard what sounded like 2 very loud jets taking off from san jose airport. i live a bout 4 miles from there and only hear the commercial jets take off in the early morning. not mid afternoon. there is also a national guard station at san jose airport. so they may have been fighter jets taking off after it as well.   the color the orb was, well it looked like it was a color of mad!
content.summary: Moffet blackhwak chasing the orb, 500-1000 feet from ground

content.detailedDescription: I got abducted with my then x boyfriend who was a federal agent. we were on slabs and beings were taking our reproductive organs. we noticed the object flying over the car.2 hours were gone from memory.
content.summary: Abducted by aliens in spacecraft

content.detailedDescription:
It was a nice sunny day in 2012 august.I was driving in caledonia,ontario with my family members. my 7 seater minivan was full.I dont remember the exact time but it was around 6 or 7 pm.The sun was beautiful that time and i told to my gf take a picture from the sun and we are all looking at the sun at that moment. my girlfriend took few picture(from the car with her iphone 3rd generation) and we didn't notice anything strange. but... when we went home i checked the photos and i noticed one very clear object on the treetop on the left hand side very close to my car then i saw couple more flying object in the sky. one is metallic colour and teardrop shape with no wings on it. the object on left hand side is really clear,you can see the shape,you can see the window on the front,even the fire guns on the two side what is rotating.So..One of the object with guns,window and wings and the other one is just a teardrop shape metallic object with no wings,no guns. but you decide may be i am wrong and nothing there just some ballons or some reflection from my car window.I know that we dont have airplanes like this but i dont believe in u.F.O's.
 why i didn't see it with my own eye's and why the others didn't see it?May be nothing was there!My opinion is just a reflection. but one thing i am  sure,this pictures are 100% real.
please let me know what you guys think.
thank you!
content.summary: This pictures was taken in caledonia,ontario in 2012 august.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying back from chicago to phoenix.. something caught my eye out the window so i watched it for about 5 minutes  seemed to never move.. no com trail.. nothing and in a split second it was gone. but before it dissappeared i took a photo and then voomed it in and the shape was uncanny!! i have flown numerous times day & night. always seen planes go bye but never anything like this
content.summary: Round and stationary at 40,000ft in a plane

content.detailedDescription:
On 9/30/14 at approximately 3pm, i was at jiffy lube getting my oil changed.  i walked outside to smoke a cigarette and noticed a small black object about a mile away, hovering under the cloud cover.  at first i thought it might be a plan flying away (reason why i couldn't tell it was moving)  after about a minute, i figured out it wasn't moving and it got my attention.  i stood there trying to figure it out for another minute or so and it quickly zipped to the right.  not like a plane/helicopter would fly, but started at full speed then a dead stop just as fast.  at that point i realized i wasn't watching something normal, dropped my smoke and grabbed my iphone from my pocket.  i zoomed in as far as i could and took two pics of the object hovering, but you can't see anything in the pics.  so i figured i would try video.  it was hard to tell on the phone what if anything was being recorded, so it only lasted a few seconds.  then i grabbed my samsung work phone, zoomed in and snapped a picture.  i took another video, for a few seconds, but once again i couldn't tell what if anything was showing up on camera.  right when i put the phone down (of course) it zipped across the sky again straight up into the clouds.

only 1 picture shows anything and it's just a black dot that you can only see by zooming in.  the object was a lot large in person.  the one video only shows a small black object moving around for a second, and not zipping across the sky like i had seen prior and after the camera.
content.summary: Black object hovering over reno, nv

content.detailedDescription:
Note: the following incident appears to be a part of a larger incident which apparently involves multiple sightings of ufo's, air force jets and black helicopters near the town of st. paul alberta during the period of late august into early september, 2014.

on august 31st, 2014, i was out at a farm near st. paul, alberta babysitting the cat and dog for my sister who had gone on holidays. at approximately 5:15 p.M. a sudden storm appeared. i hurriedly shut down the computer i was working on and then went up the short staircase to the living room to unplug the television and stereo. just two steps from the top of the stairs there was an incredible white light that briefly completely blinded me accompanied by a deafening crash of thunder. a couple of seconds later, i recovered and proceeded to check the house for fire as i could smell wires burning. nothing could be found but there was now no power or telephone. 

i drove to the neighbour's approximately 1/2 mile away and he called the power company to restore power. the telephone company, telus, indicated that no assistance would be rendered as there was no indication the telephones were not working and my sister had made an appointment to have a technician come out on september 8th. thus, i was to be without a telephone for that period. 

the power was restored at approximately 9:15 p.M. after which i had more work to do on the computer and proceeded to work at the kitchen table on the main floor. the dog and cat had returned from hiding and had settled in for the night, the dog in her doghouse at the east end of the house.

at approximately 10:45, i moved some materials up into the living room area where i was going to sleep, turning the hallway light on low. i returned to the kitchen to get the remainder of the material then went back down the hallway, turned on my flashlight and turned off the hallway light. i flashed the flashlight across the room to get my bearings and in doing so, flashed it across the southwest window which was approximately 8 feet from me. 

something brilliant at the window caught my eye and i quickly returned the flashlight's beam in that direction. i could immediately see two very large (perhaps 2+ inches by 3-4 inches in size) highly reflective, flourescent yellow-green oval eyes peering back at me from the blackness outside. for a brief time they were still and i moved towards the window. then it turned its head to its right which lowered the right eye. it kept this attitude for approximately 2-3 seconds then abruptly disappeared from view.

interestingly, i felt no fear at the time (although the incident started to bother me days later.) i hurried to the window to check below but nothing was visible. i checked the other window to the north but nothing was visible either. the night was very dark as the sky was heavily overcast. no facial details could be seen as it was observing me through the window screen which blocked the light from the flashlight. no noise was heard during this time and there appeared to be nothing aggressive about the entity. 

to verify what i had seen, i then retraced my steps and flashed the flashlight as i did originally to check to see if anything in the room was giving a reflection in the window. nothing i could do would create the image i saw. i then decided to go to bed as there was nothing else i could do. as far as i can tell, the rest of the night was uneventful. 

i later determined that only from this one window alone, could anything watch me working at the kitchen table and avoid detection by myself and our rottweiler. it was also the farthest away from the dog who, at night, tended to stay at the east end of the house.  

the next day, my nephew, an electrician, came over and re-routed the telephone wiring so that i would have telephone service. the wires were found to be completely burned off the cordless phone base on the hallway desk and other connections as well. 

nothing further transpired until one of my sisters called me a couple of days later. she mentioned that my other sister who lives approximately 1-1/2 miles directly south of where i was located was seeing ufo's in the area, coming in, hovering around the adjacent lake then leaving. later, i was to find out from a third sister that the one by the lake had also seen jets and black helicopters in the area at the same time. i remember hearing the jets and thinking to myself "boy are those guys flying low today!" though i was in the house at the time and did not see them fly over her area.

another interesting point was that we have a neighbour who lives between my position and my sister's position to the south and his dog kept barking, putting up a terrible fuss at night and refusing to be quiet. 

another curious observation was that our cat and dog would be constantly watching the forest to the southwest of the house if they ventured to the south side. they seemed to be reacting as if there was something there that frightened them and refrained from going in that direction as they usually did during the course of the day. 

a day or so after the incident i measured the height from ground level to the level at which the 'eyes' were seen in the window. the distance was 7 ft., 7 inches. thus, this entity would have been approximately 8 ft. tall unless it was using some means of support. no scratches or changes of any type were found on the windows, screen or wall. the surface of the ground on that side of the house is very hard and compacted and there is also a concrete wall on which something could have stood. 

i also checked on the web to see if there were any animals that would have eyes like that at night in the beam of a light. though there are in the area bears, moose, deer, coyotes and panthers which are large mammals, nothing had eyes like that or gave that kind of reflection when photographed in a light beam. the eyes, due to their size and shape, had to be something very different than our usual animals.  

a few days after my incident, my sister from the south telephoned me shortly after 6 a.M. telling me to go outside - there was a red and green flashing ufo to the south. i quickly went outside and to the highway which is only site where the southern sky is not obscured by trees but could see nothing. a heavy fog blocked my view to the south so i returned to the house. i thought she may have been seeing and mistaking sirius which is in that part of the morning sky at this time of year. however, she had said that the ufo's were coming, hovering and leaving and she was very afraid. that ruled out sirius.

i feel that a thorough investigation of the incident should be attempted as there are probably a number of other people in the area who observed some part of the incident in one manner or another and who could help piece the story together. 

i personally did not see any ufo's during this period but there are some interesting points to ponder:
- did the lightning strike have anything to do with the ufo's in the area?
- what was it that continued to entice ufo's to the area?
- was the entity that i saw part of the reason for the ufo visits?
- was there a lost alien and/or craft that had come down in the area?
- how had the air force become aware of the ufo's in the area?
- what was the air force doing in the area?
- what other aspects of this story remain to be told?
content.summary: An 'entity' was found observing me with two very large, oval, flourescent yellow-green reflective eyes unlike any animal.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside a bonfire in dayton, indiana.  the night was clear and great for star gazing.  around 10 pm, we began to observe a bright light that was hovering high in the sky toward to north, maybe 30-40 miles away.  we could see its white light pulsate, it would become brighter and dim a bit.  we watched it hover, then go up and down a little and go side to side a little for a while, maybe 20-30 min. we pulled out binoculars and could see that the object also had red, blue and green lights pulsating and rotating around the craft.  it did that for 20-30 min more.  then it traveled  farther away, at least we thought since it became smaller and dimmer.  then  it came back after about 10 min.  it was bright again hovering, pulsating its' lights, going up and down and side to side a little.  it remained for another 15 min or so and then left and didn't return. the craft seemed to have a purpose and was under intelligent control. we are certain it wasn't a plane or helicopter as they have flashing red light and travel in a regular pattern.  our group of 3 adults and one child are convinced it was a ufo.  we were excited, yet overwhelmed a bit by the fact we had witnessed such a phenomenon.  we did try to capture the image on a phone, but it was too far to photograph.
content.summary: Observed for over 1 hr, bright white light with red, green, and blue colors rotating around the middle of the object, it hovered up/down, traveled closer/and away

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i left his house headed to the store. while driving south i noticed what looked like a fireball falling into the atmosphere, but it was much larger than any other i've heard of. it continued to fall then stopped mid fall. at that point we pulled over and began recording it on the phone. suddenly the object headed south at an amazing rate of speed.
content.summary: Falling fireball that changed directions and took off.

content.detailedDescription:
3 weeks ago i was taking the trash can to the road for the trash truck around 6"30am. when i came back, my neighbor that lives behind me
(she's like 60 or so) called me  by saying "can you come here please, i need to talk to you: i walked over to her trailer and she was smoking. she said she'd been smoking around 4 or 5am when she said a light come down and drop a huge black thing on my roof. i didn't say anything because i have been experiencing stomping on my roof every place i lived since i was a child. she is constantly bothering me about it at least 3 or 4 times per week. she just bothered me again about it today. she knocked on my back door this time. please ask her to stop!
content.summary: I didn't see it my neighbor keeps seeing it

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving alone in my car on the route 117 northbound on the september 26 2014 between 6h30pm and 7 pm. i was near the city of pr√©vost, province of qu√©bec. it was a clear sky, the sun was coming down, no cloud at all. then i notice a very bright light in the sky. it was the only light in the sky, no airplane, nothing else. 

the light was stationnary so i thought it was a very bright star at first but the light seems closer than a star would be. but then the sphere of light flew away in a few seconds. it went  northbound. i lost contact of the object when it went over the mountains. my hole obeservation was for around 25 seconds.

my heart "stops" when i saw the shere of light fly away because i realise then that, that was not a star. i was in sort of shock.
content.summary: Bright orb hovering for a few seconds then fly away at very high speed

content.detailedDescription: 4 lights going across sky but moving independently .
content.summary: Fly by at slow speed

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in the office room area with the door open playing xbox 360 on our flat screen tv. i felt a strange feeling as if we were being watched or something or someone was in the room. i grabbed my camera and just started taking pictures around the whole room and doorway. i then looked at the pictures i captured and was amazed at the outcome. i have posted this on youtube i have showed to family and friends and they all say the same thing, wow thats crazy. i have experienced sightings since 2012 and they continue to this day. i have installed 4 security cameras in and around my home. the cameras have captured crazy unexplainable footage as well. i finally decided to ask for some help or explanation from some professionals because i have moved 3 times since my first sighting and i still see these objects, orbs, entities. i do not know what they are and would please like some help. i constantly see orbs in and outside of my home on my cameras and they change direction, shape and stop in mid air then continue in another direction. bugs, dust, flashlights do not do this. my last straw was seeing a light beam with what looked like an alien or something with a head and eyes inside. on the video captured you can clearly see i am trying to figure out what this is. the beam of light shines right next to the office doorway and on the right side corner of the screen at a certain frame there appears an unexplainable glowing object then you see a mist shaped like a little being walk across the screen then turn around look into the camera and fastly walk back. i am so baffled and my family is tired of me and this ufo stuff. can you please take a look at all my videos, pictures and tell me what the heck is it?? i would really appreciate your time and investigation. thank you
note: i will also send a few pictures captured 2012 please enlarge the photo and notice the blue, green, red dots around the object. some have + in the middle. i have lots more photos and video. i recorded video on about 4 - 5 different recording devices but they all show the same thing.. please confirm i am not crazy or seeing things.
content.summary: Felt a chill and started taking pictures around the room, these green entities captured

content.detailedDescription: Have observed this phenomena twice before. hovering, blinking/flickering bright circular light. colors: primarily white white, and brief flashes of blue, orange-red.  appears to be above the los angeles port/harbor. i'm in bed looking out my window in san pedro. actually, just looked up from typing this and it has moved from the stationary spot it has been hovering for approximately 30 minutes ( when i first observed it  during a bout of insomnia )...It is now hovering a little higher in the sky and to the west. i feel helpless because i feel alone in this experience. i woke up my boyfriend, but he wears glasses, didn't put them on, and said he doesn't think he can see anything right now. has anyone else seen this?
content.summary: Hovering, blinking/fluttering bright circular light. colors: primarily white white, and brief flashes of blue, orange-red.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting  on my bed iand i notice a glow coming from the windoew  so got up and  my camera 
so went outside my window and start taken pic it hovern over down town los angeles
content.summary: I notice something glow out side window glowing so i grab my camera and stared to take picture

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside of work smoking a cigarette gazing at the stars as i normally do i noticed a semi bright light dimming as it traveled across the sky it would  brighten and dim several times going across then a large bright orange light appeared and nothing.
content.summary: It would dim then brighten did this about 6 time that i saw then a large bright orange flash and gone
